Egg Macro-Muffin Sandwich!

This breakfast sandwich is sure to start your morning off strong. Housemade spiced pork sausage, hearty egg whites, and a fluffy yuca bun are the clean alternative to this fast-food favorite. (Consuming syrup adds 100 cal/25g carbs)

$8.95

Item added to cart



MACROGFDFPALEOZONE

Ingredients 

Egg, Yuca, Sweet Potato, Pork, Sage, Red Pepper Flake, Maple Syrup, Olive Oil, Cumin, Salt, Pepper

Nutritional Info

Calories 450
Protein 34g
Fat 15g
Carbs 45g

Why do I need to create an account?

We need to determine your delivery address and whether you want delivery to your home, office or gym.

How it works

  • Add meals to your cart
  • Upon checkout, select delivery dates for your meals
  • There is a $10 minimum on your total order
  • All Meals must be ordered 4-5 days prior, so we have time to source the freshest possible ingredients
  • Contact us if you have questions or feedback. We like hearing from you! ([email protected])
